mapper.insert: insert into sys_lession (lesson_name, lesson_count, lesson_order, lesson_week, lesson_teacher, gmt_create, gmt_modifide) VALUES (#{lessonName}, #{lessonCount}, #{lessonOrder}, #{lessonWeek}, #{lessonTeacher}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT count(a.lesson_name) FROM sys_lession a join sys_lob_les b on a.id = b.les_id and a.lesson_name like concat('%', #{lessonName}, '%') and a.lesson_order = #{lessonOder} and a.lesson_week = #{lessonWeek}
select * from sys_lob where lab like concat('%', #{lessonName}, '%') and count >= #{count} AND status = 0
